timeline.message:
Selectively apply Zweihander crits

They were always applied to both arms, but this should only be true for
punching.  For club attacks, only the arm with the weapon gets the
critical.

timeline.bodyText:
I think this would be "easier" to use if criticalLocs was varargs, as in Integer... criticalLocs
Not at all a requirement.
